column1: Kata Robata////Came here for the first time for my boyfriend & I's anniversary and was not disappointed! The restaurant is very clean and has a nice ambiance. Our server
column3: took lovely care of us while our stay. All the dishes that we ordered were amazing!! The Mac and cheese dish was very filling and such a large portion for the price. We also ordered the matcha cheesecakes for desert to wrap it all up! Everything was amazingly delicious and we will be back!!
